lender.name: AHHR
lender.loan_because: i need to help my people in Haiti.
lender.occupational_info:
At present we are busy with setting up foundation AHHR (Antillian Haitian Human Rights). Foundation AHHR will help gone off the rails Antillian and Haitian young people for a better future. To realise this I have I need your financial help for this reason I ask YOU a one-off contribution/Donation or each contribution is most welcome. With YOU help I can help gone off the rails Antillian and Haitian young people for 3 years to their return to an more better life. YOU contribution can help foundation AHHR makes possible and to stimulate contacts between gone off the rails Antillian and Haitian young people for a better life, buying second hands are based on tables etc. etc. and primary long duration foods. YOU can be also one-off anonymous donateur.
Thx for Your help.

lender.name: Francine Marie-Sheppard
lender.loan_because: I love the possibility of making a difference in someones life. I want to encourage people to be creative and to do what they can to make a more comfortable life for themselves. Sharing and giving helps contribute towards a more peaceful and healthy planet for all of us.

lender.name: Bosco Bongnea
lender.loan_because: I am an advocate for women and children in deeprived communities. The category of women that I focus on are widows and the education of orphaned children
lender.occupational_info: I am a professional health worker and a Roman Catholic Religious Brother with the FIC Brothers based in Ghana. Having studied at the undergrade and graduate levels in health has broadened by development orientation to community development work since 2003. I work passionately for people with disabilities and women and children who are the most marginalized in soceity. Been passonate about these groups means siding with them in joy and in sorrow. A recent engagement on women works is the widows association in development project in the Ullo traditional area, in the Jirarapa district of the upper west region of Ghana. Married men are dying more than the women in the traditional area. The question that came up is, if women are the bread winners whilst the men are alive, what happens when the man dies? The answer is the woman becomes a double breadwinner of the family with no job opportunities for an income. Based on the plight of these widows, the project intends to establish income generating activities that will be accessible and to be used to make an income to support their livelihood. In this way, the education of thier children will also be promoted as well as thier health.

lender.name: Megan
lender.occupational_info: Avvo offers free ratings on a scale of 1 to 10 for 90% of practicing lawyers and 90% of licensed MDs in the US. Avvo also offers a free Q&A forum, where consumers can ask questions and receive certified answers from real doctors or lawyers.

lender.name: agus edi pribadi
lender.loan_because: I agus edi p. age 30 years had just married and had one child I worked as part-time employee at a company manufacturing household soya drinks, that is by wholesale to the skipper and then sell it to the market, after I had children my economy needs more and more fit while my income hand to mouth, if I get my loan plan to buy soybean milling tool and produce their own soya milk, so I do not need to wholesale again and have more profit. and who knows could open jobs around the house
lender.occupational_info: I started work at 10 am to 8 pm for cooking soy, then rest and wake up at 3 am just to sell on the market until 6 am. My wholesale price from skipper rp 800,00 then I sell rp 1000.00, from sales that I fortunately rp 200.00 per pack. I usually get lucky rp 50000.00 per day but if I get more crowded 80000.00
